ygData.subject: Re: PoF pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 3. If you have this god-like power, why should you ever die? The fact that he was put there and is killable implies that he can and should be killed.
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 16 Dec 1999, Dave Gaines wrote:
>
> > Think for a moment. If CT *really* had a death touch, what
> > would he do the moment he discovered mortals were messing
> > around in his realm? DT all of them. Isn't that what *you'd*
> > do if you were playing CT? If you want a balanced (i.e. fun)
> > game, you can't go willy nilly giving mobs all sorts of
> > super-powers.
>
> You were doing so well... then this paragraph.
>
> 1. Why have denizens if anytime anything comes you insta-kill? let
> your pets have some fun.
>
> 2. Yes. Stop giving these gods all sorts of god-like powers! What
> are you thinking? *grin*

3. If you have this god-like power, why should you ever die?

The fact that he was put there and is killable implies that he
can and should be killed. Giving him a power which if applied
with any iota of intelligence would result in him never dying
just doesn't make sense to me. I suppose you could claim it's
like that to make up for lack of AI, but then you're using an
artificial out-of-game reason to justify an in-game behavior -
which means it's exactly what I labeled it - a cop-out.

--
